title: Virtual Sales Representative
job_overview:
Are you a highly motivated and results-driven individual with a passion for client success? Moes Group is seeking a dedicated Virtual Sales Representative to join our growing Business Development team. In this pivotal role, you'll be the first point of contact for our new clients, guiding them from initial inquiry to successful project launch. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and are committed to building lasting partnerships, we want to hear from you!

What You'll Do:
As a Sales Representative at Moes Group, your core responsibilities will include:
Serve as the initial point of contact for all incoming leads (from forms, marketing, referrals, and digital inquiries).
Promptly qualify leads based on business type, product needs, timelines, and budget to ensure project viability.
Build rapport and understand core client needs through clear, early communication.
Escalate complex leads or negotiations to the Sales Director while providing essential support.
Maintain meticulous records of all sales activities and client communications in HubSpot (transitioning to Odoo).
Provide weekly updates to the Sales Director on new leads contacted, deals closed, deals in negotiation, and any prospect feedback or obstacles.
Represent Moes Group with the highest level of professionalism, reflecting our brand values in all interactions.

What We're Looking For:
Proven experience in a sales or business development role, ideally in a related industry.
Exceptional communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
Strong organizational abilities and meticulous attention to detail.
Ability to manage multiple leads and projects simultaneously.
Proficiency with CRM software (HubSpot experience preferred).
A proactive mindset with a strong drive to achieve and exceed sales targets.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team.
Understanding of the sales lifecycle from lead generation to closing.
Comfortable using Hubstaff for hourly time tracking (mandatory).

Why Join Moes Group?
Join a dynamic team poised for significant growth! You'll play a crucial role in expanding our client base and benefit from a supportive environment that values professionalism, continuous improvement, and strong partnerships.
